about_the_game:
You will own all the kungfu in the world. "Solider AutoChess" is a cricket-fighting auto-chess game. Every battle is 1V1. You need to constantly upgrade and skillfully combine kungfus to reach the top.

Currently, the demo has released about 1/4 of the kungfus and levels.
detailed_description:
You will own all the kungfu in the world. "Solider AutoChess" is a cricket-fighting auto-chess game. Every battle is 1V1. You need to constantly upgrade and skillfully combine kungfus to reach the top.

Currently, the demo has released about 1/4 of the kungfus and levels.
name: 小兵习武 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo2.4ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 无
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600 Series GPU or Equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 无

short_description: You will own all the kungfu in the world. "Solider AutoChess" is a cricket-fighting auto-chess game. Every battle is 1V1. You need to constantly upgrade and skillfully combine kungfus to reach the top.
